column1: Byumba is a city in northern Rwanda
column2: and is the capital of Gicumbi District. It is home to an SOS Children's Village. The city lies about 60 kilometres (37 mi)
column3: north of the capital Kigali. This location lies approximately 30 kilometres (19 mi)
column4: south of the International border with Uganda at Gatuna.
